acrobat.description: Former circus performer or just naturally gifted? You are exceptionally agile and can pull off impressive feats of dexterity.
acrobat.name: Acrobat

animal_companion.description: Sometimes Fishers befriend one of the local animals and keep them as a pet. Cats, dogs, birds or even some of the smarter crabs.
animal_companion.name: Animal Companion

archivist.description: You’re an archivist of the runic church. It is not unheard of for archivists to become fishers, taking the fight directly to the Deep and its denizens. With your training and background, you can be a potent source of spiritual nourishment for your brace.
archivist.name: Archivist

bottle_of_rum.description: What’s better than a good swig of rum after a successful fishing trip. It keeps you warm and steadies the nerves.
bottle_of_rum.name: Bottle of Rum

bundle_of_maps.description: A collection of maps depicting areas of Crescent. Most navigators possess an eclectic collection gathered over the years. Some of which can be quite valuable.
bundle_of_maps.name: Bundle of Maps

butcher.description: You’re an expert at processing and dismembering fish, separating their edible parts from their galvanic bladder. As a result, you are very familiar with a variety of fish.
butcher.name: Butcher

buzzsaw.description: Handheld buzzsaw used for processing fish. Powered via a small Galvanic engine fitted in a backpack.
buzzsaw.name: Buzzsaw

charismatic.description: You have a way with people. People like you and like interacting with you, giving you an edge in social encounters.
charismatic.name: Charismatic

charlatan.description: Lying and deception are second nature to you and you are very good at it. Some say you’re on the run from disgruntled people and that is why you became a Fisher…
charlatan.name: Charlatan

cook.description: Galvanic oil isn’t the only thing a fish is good for. The inhabitants of Crescent eat a lot of fish and you are adept at preparing the tender meat and determining what is and isn’t edible.
cook.name: Cook

criminal.description: Before you became a Fisher you often found yourself on the wrong side of the law. The skills and connections that helped you then may still be useful in your new profession.
criminal.name: Criminal

deck_of_cards.description: Gambling is an incredibly popular pastime in and around the harbors of most cities. Hopefully, there isn’t anything fishy going on with your deck because if there is, and people notice, there might be trouble.
deck_of_cards.name: Deck of Cards

deep_touched.description: You have heard the whispers of the Deep and they have had a lasting impact on you. You are familiar with the mystic aspect of the Deep and its denizens and can comprehend them.
deep_touched.name: Deep Touched

disgraced.description: Becoming a Fisher was not your first choice but you have fallen on hard times. Perhaps you were part of Crescent’s declining nobility or maybe from one of the rich merchant or industrialist families. Whatever your background, your wealth has evaporated but some people may still be impressed by your former status.
disgraced.name: Disgraced

diving_suit.description: A heavy-duty diving suit, reinforced and able to withstand great pressure. Often equipped with inflatable airbags that ensure a Fisher safely reaches the surface after performing an emergency exit from their Gear.
diving_suit.name: Diving Suit

eye_protection.description: Sturdy goggles used to protect the eyes from harm. Perhaps in the shape of shaded welding goggles or a gas mask used in the war.
eye_protection.name: Eye Protection

field_surgical_kit.description: Contains everything needed to treat wounds on the fly.
field_surgical_kit.name: Field Surgical Kit

fine_clothes.description: Fishers aren’t necessarily known for their fine garb and sense of fashion, often dressing in grimy overalls that stink of fish. This set of clothes however is finely made and in fashion. Be careful to keep them away from fish guts.
fine_clothes.name: Fine Clothes

fisher's_almanach.description: This hefty tome contains information about fish living around the shores of Crescent. By no means exhaustive but many Braces have at least one copy between them.
fisher's_almanach.name: Fisher's Almanach

fishing_gear.description: Gears are powerful humanoid machines capable of bringing to bear the strength of a hundred men. Powered by Galvanic engines these massive iron behemoths are utilized in many different fields: Warfare, Construction, Demolition, Mining, Fishing. This specific Gear is adapted for underwater use and able to operate fully submerged for hours.
fishing_gear.name: Fishing Gear

fishing_rod.description: Any fish caught with a rod is likely too small to process for oil, but some people enjoy the calming activity of rod-fishing.
fishing_rod.name: Fishing Rod

freefisher.description: You used to be, or still are, part of the Freefisher clans of southern Crescent. The rough and tumble life of a Freefisher has made you well-versed in a plethora of piracy-related fields.
freefisher.name: Freefisher

galvanic_lighter.description: Simple, lighter operating with refined galvanic oil, utilizing high voltage electricity to spark a flame and quickly replacing the tinderboxes of old.
galvanic_lighter.name: Galvanic Lighter

handgun.description: Easy to conceal sidearm. Many Fishers carry one just to feel more secure, though these small caliber weapons are unlikely to stop a denizen of the deep.
handgun.name: Handgun

learned.description: You were lucky to receive a formal education and are more knowledgeable about the world than the average person.
learned.name: Learned

magnifying_glass.description: Magnifying glass to focus on even the smallest of details.
magnifying_glass.name: Magnifying Glass

mechanic.description: You are intimately familiar with all sorts of machinery. While most Fishers can repair and tinker with their Gear you are skilled and knowledgeable with all parts of your Gear’s assembly, down to the smallest mechanism.
mechanic.name: Mechanic

menacing.description: You have an intimidating aura and others find you imposing - even scary. You are very good at intimidating people.
menacing.name: Menacing

military_kit.description: Standard military kit, canteen, trench-axe, rations, backpack, fatigues, and other useful items. Handy in many situations.
military_kit.name: Military Kit

muscular.description: You sport a phenomenal physique, corded muscles ripple across your frame. You are much stronger than the average person.
muscular.name: Muscular

oil_lantern.description: Electric lanterns powered by a small amount of Galvanic oil and quickly replacing the wick and oil versions.
oil_lantern.name: Oil Lantern

pocket_watch.description: Sturdy waterproof pocket watch, reliably tells the time no matter the conditions.
pocket_watch.name: Pocket Watch

radio-pack.description: Man-portable radios are incredibly bulky and require a backpack to carry around. Operators need specialized training to properly set up and maintain this equipment and usually have a military background.
radio-pack.name: Radio-Pack

sailor.description: You grew up on the roiling seas aboard a sturdy vessel, perhaps one of the massive whalers that traverse the oceans of Halcyon. You are very familiar with nautical matters.
sailor.name: Sailor

severely_deeptouched.description: The touch of the Deep has altered your body in some way. Be sure to hide it in polite society. The features you now share with marine life may be beneficial. Are those gills, tentacles, webbed feet?
severely_deeptouched.name: Severely Deeptouched

soldier.description: You fought in the trenches of the Prav-Crescent war as a soldier and the trenches of Grenzland left their mark on you. You are self-reliant and can handle yourself in a fight. You may also have contact with former war buddies.
soldier.name: Soldier

spyglass.description: Telescoping bronze-plated spyglass. A rare and valuable piece of equipment.
spyglass.name: Spyglass

toolbox.description: A sturdy toolbox containing a plethora of useful tools.
toolbox.name: Toolbox

trenchgun.description: Standard issue scatter gun used in the Prav-Crescent war. Perhaps you got yours from the black market or maybe you fought in the war? Less concealable but with superior stopping power. Could deter anything up to the size of a charging bull.
trenchgun.name: Trenchgun

vehicle_(land).description: Autocarriages are slowly arriving on the scene but are still relatively expensive. Most people, especially in smaller towns, utilize the tried and true horse and cart. Either way, you possess some means of getting around.
vehicle_(land).name: Vehicle (Land)

vehicle_(sea).description: Your boat is much smaller than a commercial whaler. Perhaps barely large enough to carry the brace and their Gears, maybe equipped with a little galvanic engine for propulsion.
vehicle_(sea).name: Vehicle (Sea)

velorian_long_gun.description: Unwieldy long range rifle, often used by the hunters of the Velorian Plains. Not very useful up close.
velorian_long_gun.name: Velorian Long Gun

whaler.description: Whalers are massive, bulky ships used all over the Cauldron. Older vessels are made of wood and sail, while modern whalers sport iron hulls and powerful galvanic engines.
whaler.name: Whaler
